basics.name: Shivam Padaliya
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Over four years of experience in Software and Web Development, and rich user interface design. Experienced with all stages of SLDC; problem-solver, ability to quickly grasp complex systems and identify opportunities for improvements and resolution of critical issues. Diverse work experience, ability to collaborate with a team, willingness to learn, and adaptability to work in diverse cultural environments are my strengths.

highlights: Assisted the Advanced Solutions Team developing prototypes for internal clients
Contributed to multiple web applications using modern frameworks
Built a weekly status report generator for the team’s internal Sails.js project management web app
Migrated the front-end framework of the same Sails.js project from UI Bootstrap to Angular Material
Implemented user authentication as well as role and permission management in the Sails.js project
Researched and reported on NodeJS packages for the team’s development needs
Used the UI Bootstrap framework to build a sales competency evaluation prototype
Contributed to a check reordering web app using the Ionic Framework and WebRTC
Developed software based on requirements of government project using node JS technology and making high level database design using normalization concept
Performed debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning to make efficient software performance.
Involved in Unit Testing and Bug-Fixing and achieved the maximum code coverage using JUNIT test cases.
Developed Single Page Applications using AngularJS MVC Framework and RESTful services.
Involved in development of commonly used angular components across teams such as customer directives for grid, pagination, conditional validations.
Involved in web designing using HTML5, XHTML, CSS3, LESS/SASS JavaScript and extensively used Tableless Design in CSS for positioning.
Worked with business analysts to understand their business models and goals and help define strategy, content, and features.
Handled all the client side validations, slide show, hide and show controls, dropdown menus and tab navigation using JQuery.
Developed page layouts, navigation and icons.
Created prototypes in HTML, Photoshop, JavaScript and CSS for different UI pages.
Designated UI architecture for the internal web application and worked with Designers to construct UI using React.js.
